org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.as

Class ConfigProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.as.ConfigProcessor

  • public class ConfigProcessor
extends Object
    Processor handles config information found by the parser and that is set on the current project

        public boolean addConfigConstNode(ConfigConstNode node)
        Adds a ConfigConstNode to our internal tree. Will return true if this item is unique
        Parameters:
        node - the ConfigConstNode that we have encountered while parsing.
        Returns:
        true if this is not a redefinition of a config name
